::Spears::

She looked at Slayer, not with hated, but with an old memory of what 
he was.  She nooded to Slayer and said in a soft, quiet voice,"I 
shall stay out of your way.  As Prebon has ordered me to. I shall not 
fight with you." 

She looked at Prebon, "Slayer hates me with a passion, and that 
somewhat frightens me. I don't trust him master.  I just don't trust 
him."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Slayer/Ramulus/Firearm/Soundwave/Proto::
> 
> Slayer laughs again, turning as he hears Prebon's orders. "I 
> apologise, Master. I will not intentionally scrap this pathetic 
femm."
> 
> He walks off after Prebon, growling at Spears as he passes her.
> "Watch 
> yourself," he says to her, continuing after Prebon.
> 
> Soon, he will have a chance to kill... His lips curl in 
anticipation 
> at the thought of murder, but he couldn't help hoping that a 
certain 
> female was in Ramulus' place.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus turns around, facing the other bots in the Ark. "Allright, 
a 
> few bots from the Cybertronian Fire will be here soon," he says, 
> "They'll bring cloaking devices. I'm supposed to meet him alone, 
but 
> this can easily be a trap. The cloaking devices will effectively 
hide 
> you from detection, radar or otherwise. If they open fire, we'll 
fire 
> back."
> 
> He looks around at the bots there. "Is that ok with everyone?"
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Firearm and Proto exit the Cybertronian Fire, nearly crashing into 
> Soundwave.
> 
> "Where are you going?" Firearm asks curioustly as he picks up his 
> dropped cloaking devices and puts them in various compartments.
> 
> Soundwave shruggs, looking a bit bored. "Just drug a bot to the 
brig, 
> nothing to do now."
> 
> Proto cuts in before Firearm can reply. "Great! You can come with 
us. 
> I think we're heading into battle."
> 
> The other Maximal nods, walking out of the Cybertronain Fire with 
the 
> two officers. Firearm activates his comm-link.
> 
> "Maximals," he says into it, wondering if any other bots might be 
> bored, "Me and Proto," he didn't know Soundwave's name, "Are 
heading 
> for the Ark, anyone in need of a mission can report there."
> 
> The three Maximals fly into the air, heading for the Ark.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > ::Spears::
> > She nodded to Prebon and then looked at Slayer. "I shall no 
longer 
> > fight you Slayer, under orders from Master Prebon."
> > 
> > She followed Prebon
